channel.title: Microsoft Products
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I need a favor from you!
I'm working on a rather interesting project at the moment, and I require some information on some Microsoft products. Let me explain.
I need anyone who has any sort of Microsoft hardware (keyboards, mice, mics, game controllers (for windows not 360), etc) to send/post two small things about their hardware.
1. The name of your hardware. 2. The PID for your hardware.
The name of your hardware is simple. Let's say...Microsoft Wireless Entertainment System 8000 for example. The PID can be found on the back; or somewhere on your hardware. It is usually right under a barcode and says "PID". It is usually in the form:
12345-678-9012345-67890
PID stands for product ID.
Anyone who can help and provide any hardware PIDs will be granted knowledge of what I am doing (if they wish) and in some cases I can also provide some cash if you want.
Please post/PM/whatever ASAP.
Cheers, The Bank
